32.eng-name: The Book of Jihad and Expeditions

hadiths.text: It has been narrated on the authority of Anas b. Malik that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:O God, there is no life, but the life of the Hereafter, So forgive Thou the Ansar and the Muhajirs

chapter.eng-name: The Battle of Al-Ahzab (The Confederates), also known as Al-Khandaq (The Ditch)
